snippet: Texas said Wednesday it has agreed to pay former coach Mack Brown $2.75 million that would have been owed him if he had been fired, and place him in a one-year, $500,000 job as a special assistant to the president for athletics....

headline.print_headline: Brown to Get Severance and 1-Year Job at Texas
headline.main: Brown to Get Severance and 1-Year Job at Texas

lead_paragraph: Texas said Wednesday it has agreed to pay former coach Mack Brown $2.75 million that would have been owed him if he had been fired, and place him in a one-year, $500,000 job as a special assistant to the president for athletics.
